object.name: key green
object.description: A deep green key is on the floor.

object.name: dwarven hammer
object.description: There is a dwarven hammer laying here.

object.name: dwarven plate
object.description: There is dwarven plate mail laying here.

object.name: stick
object.description: There is a long, black stick lying here.

object.name: stick
object.description: There is a long, black stick here.

object.name: club
object.description: There is a dwarven club laying here.

object.name: two-handed dwarven axe
object.description: A two-handed Dwarven axe is here.

object.name: ring golden dwarven
object.description: A pretty golden ring is here.

extra_description.description:
It seems to be a hot love letter from the Queen.  Unfortunately,
it's not suitable for transmission across a public data network.

object.name: castle key
object.description: There is a key to Strangelove Castle here.

object.name: key mine
object.description: There is a key to the mines here.

object.name: coal
object.description: There is a chunk of coal here.

object.name: pick
object.description: There is a mining pick here.

object.name: pills
object.short_descr: a box of birth control pills
object.description: There is a box of birth control pills here.

extra_description.description:
They are in a circular container, and there are numbers corresponding
to the day that they are to be taken.  You can tell they haven't been
used for a while.

object.name: map castle strangelove
object.description: A rolled up map is here.
